name: Support to the Throne
effect: If you are not the {{color}} player, you must place it faceup in your play area and gain 1 victory point.

metadata.expiration: When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the {{color}} player's units, or if the {{color}} player is eliminated, lose 1 victory point and return this card.
clarifications: This is a faceup permanent effect.
Victory point loss is immediate upon activation.

name: Trade Agreement
effect: The {{color}} player gives you all of his commodities. Then, return this card to the {{color}} player.

metadata.sabotage_window: After commodities are replenished but before they are traded.
clarifications: The player receiving the commodities does not need to have a neighbor relationship at the moment of replenishment.

name: Political Secret
effect: The {{color}} player cannot vote, play action cards, or use faction abilities until after that agenda has been resolved. Then, return this card to the {{color}} player.

metadata.sabotage_window: Immediately after the agenda is revealed, before any other cards are played.
clarifications: Prevents the use of 'Riders' by the targeted player.
Prevents the use of 'Sabotage' by the targeted player for that agenda window.

name: Ceasefire
timing: After the {{color}} player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units
effect: The {{color}} player cannot move units to the active system. Then return this card to the {{color}} player.

metadata.sabotage_window: After the system is activated, but before the Movement step begins.
clarifications: The activation token remains in the system.
Units already in the system cannot move, and units from other systems cannot enter.

name: Alliance
effect: If you are not the {{color}} player, you must place it faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you can use the {{color}} player's commander ability, if it is unlocked.

metadata.expiration: When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the {{color}} player's units, return this card to the {{color}} player.
clarifications: Does not grant the ability if the {{color}} player has not yet met their own commander unlock requirement.
You do not gain the commander unit itself, only the ability text.
